sourcesContent: function B(B,t=!1,i=1){const n=t?1e3:1024;if(Math.abs(B)<n)return`${B} B`;const o=t?["kB","MB","GB","TB","PB","EB","ZB","YB"]:["KiB","MiB","GiB","TiB","PiB","EiB","ZiB","YiB"];let e=-1;const a=Math.pow(10,i);do{B/=n,++e}while(Math.round(Math.abs(B)*a)/a>=n&&e<o.length-1);return B.toFixed(i)+" "+o[e]}export{B as humanFileSize};
